messages.title: A decade of action for our NHS
messages.content: A description that reflects Nick Clegg's advocacy and actions in support of the NHS over the past decade.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only the Liberal Democrats are committed to funding in full the £8billion our NHS needs to keep functioning over the next five years.

issues.health: Nick Clegg emphasizes past achievements and future commitments to fund the NHS, recognizing its importance for families and the health of the community.

leaflet.personalStatement: Nick Clegg shares his connection with the NHS through personal experiences and his son's treatment, demonstrating his dedication to protecting health services.

images.caption: Nick Clegg working within the community, events and engagements with constituents relating to NHS support and funding.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Nick Clegg focuses on the Liberal Democrats' unique commitment to funding the NHS and his own personal investment in the cause, highlighting the lack of similar commitment from Conservative and Labour parties.
